videoSnippet.title: Battle For The Future: Opportunity || Carlsen vs Firouzja || MC Invitational (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Support fishnet here https://lichess.org/get-fishnet

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Alireza Firouzja 
Magnus Carlsen Invitational GAME 3, 20.4.2020
Queen's Gambit Declined, Ragozin variation (D38)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 d5 4. Nc3 Bb4 5. cxd5 exd5 6. Bf4 O-O 7. e3 Bf5 8. Qb3 Nc6 9. Nh4 Be6 10. Bd3 a5 11. O-O Nh5 12. Bg3 Nxg3 13. hxg3 Be7 14. Nf3 Nb4 15. Be2 c5 16. a3 c4 17. Qd1 Na6 18. b3 Nc7 19. bxc4 dxc4 20. a4 Bb4 21. Qc2 Bxc3 22. Qxc3 Nd5 23. Qa3 Rc8 24. Rfc1 Nb4 25. Rc3 Nd5 26. Rcc1 Nb4 27. Ne5 c3 28. Nd3 Qb6 29. Rab1 Bf5 30. Rb3 Bxd3 31. Bxd3 c2 32. Rxc2 Rxc2 33. Bxc2 Qc6 34. Bf5 Qd5 35. Bg4 Nc2 36. Qb2 Nb4 37. Rc3 b6 38. Be2 Qf5 39. Rc1 g6 40. Bb5 Rc8 41. Rxc8+ Qxc8 42. Qd2 Qf5 43. f3 Qg5 44. Kf2 Nd5 45. Qd3 h5 46. e4 Nb4 47. Qe3 Qf6 48. Qc3 Kh7 49. f4 Qe6 50. Qc4 Qxe4 51. Qxf7+ Kh6 52. Qf6 Kh7 53. Qe5 Qc2+ 54. Kg1 Qd2 55. Kh2 Nc2 56. Qe7+ Kh6 57. Qf8+ Kh7 58. Bc4

World Champion Magnus Carlsen takes on world blitz no. 1 Hikaru Nakamura today in a 4-game rapid match as the $250,000 Magnus Carlsen Invitational begins. Usually that pairing would eclipse any other match, but 16-year-old Alireza Firouzja taking on world no. 3 Ding Liren is almost as mouth-watering. Can Alireza continue in the form that saw him beat Magnus in the Banter Blitz Cup final? All the games will be streamed live on chess24 with commentary in 9 languages as a new age of online chess begins.

https://chess24.com/en/read/news/the-magnus-carlsen-invitational-starts-today
